price: 91. Ndenge wana nde ndenge tozipaki boyebi bwa biso na oyo azalaki na yango.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
